delete.agree: I certify that I understand and that I want to delete definitively the realm and all data inside.
delete.confirm: To delete the realm, enter its name in the field below.
delete.title: Delete Realm
delete.warning: The realm and all data inside will be deleted permanently, and will be lost forever. This action is irreversible.

deleted: The realm has been deleted permanently.
title: Realms

alreadyUsed.help: Please enter a different unique slug.
alreadyUsed.lead: The unique slug is already used.

url.help: The URL of the client application. It is used as the audience of tokens (JWT) generated within this realm. The unique slug is used when no URL is specified.
url.label: URL
